show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
Michael Fontaine, PhD, a scholar of classic Roman and Greek society, illuminates our modern fields of psychology and... <!--more--> psychiatry with his insights.   Did you know that criticism and ridicule was heaped on biological psychiatry from its inception in ancient Greece?
   A very interesting, thoughtful, and enlightening hour.
